metadata.title: CVE-2017-5591 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An incorrect implementation of "XEP-0280: Message Carbons" in multiple XMPPclients allows a remote attacker to impersonate any user, includingcontacts, in the vulnerable application's display. This allows for variouskinds of social engineering attacks. This CVE is for SleekXMPP up to 1.3.1and Slixmpp all versions up to 1.2.3, as bundled in poezio (0.8 - 0.10) andother products.

criterions.comment: sleekxmpp package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
